vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract from the U. S. Department of Housing and Urban Development Community Development Block Grant - Disaster Recovery Fund of the Kleberg Rylie Recreation Center Gymnasium Renovation Project located at 1515 Edd Road - Brown & Root Industrial Services, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of eight - Not to exceed $429,000.00 - Financing: Community Development Block Grant - Disaster Recovery Fund
